channel.title: News on 梦兽编程
channel.description: Recent content in News on 梦兽编程

item.title: A Survival Guide to Zig Performance Profiling on Apple Silicon (M1/M2)
item.description: Performance profiling for Zig on Apple Silicon (M1/M2) can be challenging as common tools like perf and valgrind are not supported. This guide introduces alternatives like Samply, poop, and Tracy to help you analyze and optimize your Zig code on macOS.

item.title: From JS Chaos to TypeScript Zen: A Rust Backend Developer's Epiphany
item.description: A senior Rust backend developer's journey from despising JavaScript to embracing TypeScript. Discover why the modern web stack is crucial for backend programmers and how Rust and TypeScript can work together to build rock-solid full-stack applications.

item.title: Zhipu AI GLM-4.5 Release: New Benchmark Challenging GPT-4's AI Coding Capabilities
item.description: Zhipu AI releases GLM-4.5 series models with 355B parameters, surpassing GPT-4.1 in SWE-bench tests, ranking 3rd globally in AI benchmarks, supporting code generation, PPT creation, and full-stack development capabilities.

item.title: Six Commandments for Building Production-Ready AI Agents: From Rookie to Expert
item.description: Master the art of AI Agent development with these six proven principles covering prompt engineering, context management, tool design, and feedback loops for robust AI systems
